ygData.messageBody:
AHHHH..  Another Coloradoan I see....    that's awsome....  whereabouts in Denver do you live??  I'm in the heart of DTC area =D      I'm not sure waht the bronze is for... what did it drop off of??

Katashaka

  "Steven R. Hulse" <steve@...> wrote:

Hi all,

crude bronze. So what exactly can I do with this stuff? BTW it's my
Ranger that has it.

Thanks!
